dict.string: Quantum Badger uses Face ID to securely unlock your encrypted memory vault and authorize tool execution.
Quantum Badger requires access to specific documents to perform local analysis and search tasks as requested.
Quantum Badger requires access to the Desktop to process files you select for AI analysis.
Quantum Badger uses the local network to discover and communicate with authorized local model providers.
Quantum Badger only accesses media metadata if specifically requested for organization tasks.
